LanguageData.Alien_HornedSkaven.label: horned skaven
LanguageData.Alien_HornedSkaven.description: A skaven with horns are blessed by the horned rat. They stand atop of the hierarchy, leading the councils with visions and advise.
LanguageData.Alien_HornedSkaven.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alien_HornedSkaven.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alien_HornedSkaven.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenMoulder.label: Moulder skaven
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenMoulder.description: Skaven of clan Moulder, often of senior-rank. Rat-men with vile knowledge of clan Moulder secrets, scarred and mutated form their practice in the laboratories deep under the surface.
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenMoulder.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenMoulder.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenMoulder.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Skaven.label: skaven
LanguageData.Alien_Skaven.description: Skaven, ratmen or ratkins. They are a malevolent and diabolical race of large humanoid rat-creatures.
LanguageData.Alien_Skaven.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alien_Skaven.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alien_Skaven.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenStorm.label: Vermin
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenStorm.description: A large skaven, born stronger than the rest. They are bigger and stonger than the normal clanrats that lives across the skaven holds. They are aggressive by nature and are given to overt displays of prowess in order to intimidate those around them.
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenStorm.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenStorm.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Alien_SkavenStorm.tools.2.label: teeth
